effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion. If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion. This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion. If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion. This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion. If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion. This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.
